import React from 'react' import MyInput from '../input/MyInput' import MyButtonAdd from './MyButtonAdd/MyButtonAdd' import cl from './MyModal.module.css' export default function MyModal({visible, setVisible}) { const rootClasses = [cl.myModal] if(visible) { rootClasses.push(cl.active) } return (
setVisible(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>
) }
